channel.title: S on David Sjoberg
channel.description: Recent content in S on David Sjoberg

item.title: s - short and simple summarizing
item.description: Overview Description The s function is a simple function that helps you get intuitive results when summarizing data. It is made to be used in conjuction with summarize functions, for example min , sum and mean. s takes a vector and mutates it in the following ways: It replaces all non-rational numbers from numeric vectors and replace them with NA. Non-rational numbers are Inf, -Inf and NaN. It removes NA from the vector by default
